detectors.description:
Reentrancy in NEW.getFirstWithdrawalBonus(address) (tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#12-18):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(recipient) (tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#16)
		- ! (recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#9)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedBonus[recipient] = true (tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#17)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [NEW.getFirstWithdrawalBonus(address)](tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#L12-L18):
	External calls:
	- [withdraw(recipient)](tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#L16)
		- [! (recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)())](tests/mini_dataset/reentrancy_eth_1.sol#L9)
	State variables written after the call(s):
